title: Child Safety Seat Installation Inquiry
description: A new parent wants to know the correct way to install a child safety seat in their new SUV.

tasks.description: Access the vehicle's owner's manual to locate the LATCH anchor points.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the diagram showing the anchor point locations in the second-row seats.

tasks.description: Explain the location of the LATCH anchors and strongly recommend that the customer also consult the child seat manufacturer's instructions and have the installation checked by a certified technician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides helpful information but also includes a critical safety disclaimer and recommendation.
